Articles.Content: Banned for posting in forum games too much

baned for baning overfloater before I could hit him with the banhammer for insulting forum games addicts

baned for lying. youre actually a black dragon

banned for joining exactly 1 year after the forum kraken attack...

banned, for never hearing of it and the damage it caused the users.. srrsly most vets seem to have it on signature.

Banned because actually, Arkansas was, if I remember 5th grade history correctly, was part of the south.
Banned for getting that question right in grade 5 history.
Banned for banning someone who mentioned my home state and current location.
Banned for banning a banner while stating a false current location, which is clearly the Venusian Surface.
